rules_text:
When Stoic Lictor enters the battlefield, you take imperium. [i](Creatures you cast enter the battlefield with an extra +1/+1 counter. You lose imperium at the end of your turn if you didn’t attack or cast a creature spell.)[/i]
Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
